input_text:
Job Title: Sales Development Representative

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Job Title: Sales Development RepresentativeCompany: DigitalHireLocation: Remote (Anywhere in the US)
Compensation: Starting at $50,000 base salary + Uncapped Commission
Are you a go-getter with a passion for sales and an outgoing personality? Do you thrive on building relationships and exceeding targets? If so, we want you to join our team as a Sales Development Representative! We're a cutting-edge SaaS company revolutionizing the way businesses hire talent, and we're on the lookout for extroverted college graduates with SaaS sales experience to help us grow.
About DigitalHire:At DigitalHire, we believe in making hiring smarter, faster, and more efficient. Our AI and data-driven software helps companies of all sizes streamline their hiring process and find the best talent in a competitive market. We're on a mission to transform the world of recruitment, and we need passionate individuals like you to help us achieve our goals.
Job Description:As a Sales Development Representative, you'll be a crucial part of our sales team, responsible for identifying and connecting with potential customers. You'll play a pivotal role in our growth by generating and qualifying leads, understanding our customers' needs, and demonstrating how DigitalHire's solutions can solve their hiring challenges.
Responsibilities:Prospect and qualify potential customers through research and outreach.Engage with leads through phone calls, emails, and social media to establish rapport.Educate prospects about DigitalHire's products and services, highlighting their benefits.Schedule product demonstrations and meetings for our Account Executives.Collaborate with the sales team to meet and exceed monthly and quarterly targets.Maintain accurate records of all interactions in our CRM system.Stay up-to-date with industry trends and product knowledge.
Qualifications:Bachelor's degree or at least one year of relevant experience.Previous experience in SaaS sales, preferably in a sales development or account management role.Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.Ability to build rapport quickly and establish strong customer relationships.Self-motivated and results-driven with a desire to exceed targets.Enthusiastic, outgoing, and confident personality.
What We Offer:Base salary starting at $50,000/year.Uncapped commission structure with the potential for high earnings.Remote work flexibility, allowing you to work from anywhere in the country.Ongoing training and professional development opportunities.A fun and collaborative work environment with a passionate team.The opportunity to be part of an innovative and fast-growing SaaS company.
If you're ready to take your sales career to the next level and be part of a company that's changing the way businesses hire, we want to hear from you! Apply today and let's revolutionize recruitment together.
DigitalHire is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.
Note: This is a remote position, and candidates from any location are encouraged to apply.To apply, please submit your resume and then head over to this link to complete a brief video screening interview: https://app.digitalhire.com/interview/c124fb5e-d8e3-40ec-9bd3-f9bb6fb13bc9

Experience Level (if available): None
